quote: You should see the murderous stares I get on the street. Though I think that has less to do with seeing a man carrying a purse and more to do with paisley. Paisley makes everyone cranky.
quote_letters: YOU SHOULD SEE THE MURDEROUS STARES I GET ON THE STREET THOUGH I THINK THAT HAS LESS TO DO WITH SEEING A MAN CARRYING A PURSE AND MORE TO DO WITH PAISLEY PAISLEY MAKES EVERYONE CRANKY
